hopobject.name: vangalapraveenkumar
hopobject.body: My project idea is to configure the Beagleboard-xM as a simple mini computer and interfacing with the LCD projector through HDMI port and VGA cable. By this when power point presentation is given, we need not have a separate Desktop Computer or Laptop. By this we will be able to directly connect pen drive to the beagleboard-xM and present the "Power Point Presentations".
hopobject.shortdesc: Configure beagleboard-xm as mini computer and interface with LCD projector.
